title: Keyword Research Tutorial For Amazon KDP 2025
description:
Finding profitable keywords on Amazon KDP doesn’t have to be complicated! In this video, I’ll show you a simple method anyone can use to discover keywords that actually sell — without spending hours guessing or using expensive tools.

In this video, I explain:
✅ What keywords really are on Amazon KDP
✅ The different types of keywords every author should know
✅ How to use keywords the right way to help your books get found
✅ Where to place keywords — in your title, subtitle, description, and backend fields

Understanding how keywords work can be the difference between no sales and steady daily sales. Whether you’re creating low-content, medium-content, or full-length books, this video will help you finally make sense of Amazon’s keyword system.

If you’ve been publishing books without seeing results, start here — this is the foundation every KDP author needs!
